column5: I grew up playing a lot of sports  as a kid and I think thats where the love of a good nickname came from lol Sometimes I was given them  - Gordy, Gordo, Taco, Drew and Panjo to name a few and sometimes I gave them The Jigging Gnome for my friend Mark is one of my favorites - its started when he caught this walleye Full story from our trip to Shekak Lake is here  https://www.northernjacks.com/post/the-jigging-gnome-of-shekak-lake Hope you enjoy Andrew
